# Methods

## Plant Material and Area Management

•	Soybean variety: DSR-1950 R2Y

•	Soybean seed rate: 140,000

•	Soybean row width: 30-inch rows at 1 in depth

•	Soybean planting date: 6/10/2019

•	Herbicide application: 
*PRE app:* Dual II Magnum @ 1.5 pt/a +
   Roundup PowerMax @ 22 fl oz/a +
   AMS @8.5 lb/100 gal

*POST app:* Liberty @ 24 fl oz/a + AMS @ 8.5lb/100 gal on 6/18 to kill volunteer soybeans. 
Roundup @ 22 fl oz/a + AMS @ 8.5lb/100 gal on 8/8 to kill weed escapes.

•	PRE-herbicide application: 06/11

•	Herbicide treatments application (Flat): 8:35 am to 9:35 am on July 12

•	Soybean stage at flat application: V4/V5

•	Flat removal from low-tunnel: 8:35 am to 9:35 am on July 14

•	Results presented at 14 and 28 DAT (days after treatment)

•	Photos taken at 28 DAT  

## Modeling

Sybean injury (%) was collected every foot (0 to 25 ft) from the center of the experimental unit. A row with highest soybean injury was chosen for data collection. Soybean injury and height are shown in box plots.

# Results

```{r include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
Data <- read_csv("SB22.csv") %>% 
  filter(DAT == "14")
Data$treatment <- factor(Data$treatment)
Data$distanceft <- factor(Data$distanceft)


Data$treatment <-factor(Data$treatment, levels=c("1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6",  "7", "8"), labels=c("XtendiMax w/ Vaporgrip + PowerMax + MON 51817 - Vaporgrip + Intact", "MON 301621 - RupXtend II Complete", "MON 301621 - RupXtend II Complete + Liberty 280 SL", "MON 119151 - RupXtend II VGrip", "MON 119151 - RupXtend II VGrip + MON 51817 - VaporGrip", "MON 119151 - RupXtend II VGrip + Liberty 280 SL", "MON 119151 - RupXtend II VGrip + Liberty 280 SL + MON 51817 - VaporGrip + Intact", "Untreated"))

```


```{r echo=FALSE, fig.width=22, fig.height=14}
ggplot(Data, aes(x=distanceft, y=injury)) + 
  ggtitle("19-ARL-SB22 at 14 DAT - Injury") + geom_boxplot(outlier.shape=1, fill="red", alpha=0.2, width=0.7) + 
     theme(axis.text=element_text(size=22, color="black"), 
        axis.title=element_text(size=24,face="bold"), 
        panel.background = element_rect(fill="white", color = "black"), title = element_text(size=26),
        panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "white"), plot.title = element_text(lineheight=.8, face="bold", hjust = 0.5),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), strip.background = element_rect(fill="darkgreen", color="white"), strip.text.x = element_text(size = 18, margin = margin(0.3,0,0.3,0, "cm"), color="white", face="bold")) + ylim(0,60) + facet_wrap(~treatment, ncol = 2) + labs(y="Soybean Injury (%)", x="Distance (ft)", caption = "Source: University of Wisconsin-Madison Weed Science, 2018") 
```


```{r echo=FALSE, fig.width=22, fig.height=14}
ggplot(Data, aes(x=distanceft, y=height)) + 
  ggtitle("19-ARL-SB22 at 14 DAT - Height") + geom_boxplot(outlier.shape=1, fill="red", alpha=0.2, width=0.7) +  
     theme(axis.text=element_text(size=22, color="black"), 
        axis.title=element_text(size=24,face="bold"), 
        panel.background = element_rect(fill="white", color = "black"), title = element_text(size=26),
        panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "white"), plot.title = element_text(lineheight=.8, face="bold", hjust = 0.5),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), strip.background = element_rect(fill="darkgreen", color="white"), strip.text.x = element_text(size = 18, margin = margin(0.3,0,0.3,0, "cm"), color="white", face="bold")) + ylim(0,60) + facet_wrap(~treatment, ncol = 2) + labs(y="Soybean Height (cm)", x="Distance (ft)", caption = "Source: University of Wisconsin-Madison Weed Science, 2018") 
```
